casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Russell Antoine COOPER. No. 490P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 8, 2007. Anthony M. Brannon, Raleigh, for Cooper. C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney for State.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 649 S.E.2d 664.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of October 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of October 2007."
